name: SANGA OF DA TUNDA
author: Sliferx
notes:
24-9 Counter Fairy 3sd from leg1 to kog

This is the only counter fairy version that worked out for me, although it is late season the other CF decks barely got a winstreak going and just were not good enough. Spikeshield with chain is great in this deck might be worth to add more of it. You can adapt the backrow to the meta.
